attributes.title: RockBlocks
attributes.description:
Created on November 8, 2010 by andrew.from.pretoria on Sourcemap.org:

RockBlocks are used in an experiment in human-computer-interaction. Natural soft rock is sculpted either by hand or power tools to represent an arrow. The rocks are then mounted on a wooden base using a threaded bolt. Embedded inside each arrow assembly are two permanent magnets.
